typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		pk_key_inc as string,
		inc_retention as decimal(28,10),
		inc_gic_incident_id as decimal(28,10),
		inc_mygard_claim_id as string,
		inc_date_archive as date,
		inc_deleted_ind as string,
		inc_year_of_registered as decimal(28,10),
		inc_ind_open as string,
		inc_reg_in_paris_pool_ind as string,
		inc_claim_process_desc as string,
		grp_text as string,
		inc_team_description as string,
		inc_longitude as decimal(28,10),
		date_last_updated as timestamp,
		inc_voyage_to as string,
		inc_ded_used_text_1 as string,
		inc_registered_by_desc as string,
		inc_ded_used_amount_2 as decimal(28,10),
		best_value_estimate as decimal(28,10),
		inc_vessel_name as string,
		inc_yearmonth_of_registered as decimal(28,10),
		inc_reserve_created_by_desc as string,
		inc_text_restricted as string,
		inc_claim_adjuster_desc as string,
		grp_description as string,
		inc_gard_claim_id as string,
		grp_event_detail_description as string,
		inc_registered_date as date,
		inc_voyage_from as string,
		inc_main_claim_detail_desc as string,
		inc_main_claim_handler_desc as string,
		grp_ind_major_incient as string,
		grp_key as string,
		grp_main_event_code as string,
		inc_latitude as decimal(28,10),
		inc_om_rule_code as string,
		inc_ded_used_amount_usd_1 as decimal(28,10),
		inc_reserve_created_by_code as string,
		inc_year_of_incident_calyear as decimal(28,10),
		inc_description as string,
		inc_year_of_incident as decimal(28,10),
		last_updated_by as string,
		inc_incident_risk_group_desc as string,
		inc_me_tlo_ind as string,
		inc_complexity_desc as string,
		inc_date_of_incident as date,
		inc_geotag_reference as string,
		inc_claim_process_code as string,
		inc_casualty_cause as string,
		reserve_worst_outcome as decimal(28,10),
		inc_status_desc as string,
		inc_imono as string,
		inc_text as string,
		inc_ded_used_amount_1 as decimal(28,10),
		inc_ded_used_days_1 as decimal(28,10),
		inc_me_tlo_type as string,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		inc_ded_used_curr_2 as string,
		inc_ded_used_amount_usd_2 as decimal(28,10),
		inc_om_rule_desc as string,
		inc_me_claim_cat_type as string,
		inc_registered_by_code as string,
		inc_text_unresticted as string,
		inc_claim_adjuster_code as string,
		inc_code as string,
		inc_immediate_cause as string,
		grp_claim_incurred_gross_usd as decimal(28,10),
		inc_ded_used_curr_1 as string,
		inc_main_claim_detail_code as string,
		inc_ded_used_text_2 as string,
		grp_event_deatil_code as string,
		inc_date_archive_old as date,
		inserted_by as string,
		inc_place_of_incident as string,
		inc_main_claim_type_desc as string,
		inc_yearmonth_of_incident as decimal(28,10),
		inc_date_last_reviewed as date,
		inc_members_reference as string,
		inc_payment_created_by_desc as string,
		inc_main_jurisdiction as string,
		inc_complexity_code as string,
		inc_ded_used_days_2 as decimal(28,10),
		grp_main_event_description as string,
		inc_incident_risk_group as string,
		inc_main_claim_type_code as string,
		inc_incident_reference as string,
		grp_code as string,
		reserve_best_outcome as decimal(28,10),
		inc_file_number as string,
		grp_id as decimal(28,10),
		inc_payment_created_by_code as string,
		inc_main_claim_handler_code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_prepare.pre_dim_incident',
	format: 'query',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_incident_pa.parquet']) ~> preDimIncidentPa
preDimIncidentPa derive(top_key = 'ALL',
		top_description = 'All Incidents',
		inc_me_tlo_ind = coalesce(inc_me_tlo_ind,'N')) ~> DeriveColumns
DeriveColumns alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		dimension_key as long,
		inc_text_restricted as string,
		inc_ded_used_amount_2 as decimal(28,10),
		grp_claim_incurred_gross_usd as decimal(28,10),
		inc_longitude as decimal(28,10),
		inc_key as string,
		inc_imono as string,
		grp_event_detail_code as string,
		inc_ded_used_curr_2 as string,
		inc_main_jurisdiction as string,
		best_value_estimate as decimal(28,10),
		inc_payment_created_by_code as string,
		inc_date_registered as date,
		inc_registered_by_code as string,
		inc_me_tlo_ind as string,
		inc_code as string,
		grp_id as long,
		inc_gic_incident_id as long,
		inc_casualty_cause as string,
		inc_mygard_claim_id as string,
		inc_main_claim_type_desc as string,
		inc_ded_used_text_2 as string,
		inc_status_desc as string,
		grp_key as string,
		inc_ded_used_amount_usd_1 as decimal(28,10),
		inc_members_reference as string,
		inc_ind_open as string,
		inc_voyage_to as string,
		inc_main_claim_hdl_job_email as string,
		inc_complexity_desc as string,
		inc_ded_used_days_1 as decimal(28,10),
		inc_place_of_incident as string,
		inc_ded_used_amount_usd_2 as decimal(28,10),
		grp_ind_major_incident as string,
		inc_claim_process_code as string,
		inc_main_claim_handler_code as string,
		inc_team_description as string,
		grp_description as string,
		inc_registered_by_desc as string,
		reserve_worst_outcome as decimal(28,10),
		inc_yearmonth_of_registered as integer,
		inc_main_claim_type_code as string,
		reserve_best_outcome as decimal(28,10),
		inc_text_unrestricted as string,
		inc_date_archive_old as date,
		inc_claim_adjuster_desc as string,
		inc_date_archive as date,
		inc_date_of_incident as date,
		inc_main_claim_hdl_job_tlf as string,
		inc_payment_created_by_desc as string,
		inc_geotag_reference as string,
		inc_main_claim_handler_desc as string,
		inc_ded_used_amount_1 as decimal(28,10),
		inc_ded_used_days_2 as decimal(28,10),
		inc_text as string,
		inc_om_rule_code as string,
		inc_claim_adjuster_job_email as string,
		inc_main_claim_detail_desc as string,
		inc_year_of_incident_calyear as integer,
		inc_latitude as decimal(28,10),
		inc_file_number as string,
		inc_reserve_created_by_desc as string,
		inc_vessel_name as string,
		inc_yearmonth_of_incident as integer,
		inc_ded_used_curr_1 as string,
		inc_reg_in_paris_pool_ind as string,
		grp_code as string,
		grp_text as string,
		inc_immediate_cause as string,
		inc_incident_risk_group_desc as string,
		inc_reserve_created_by_code as string,
		inc_voyage_from as string,
		inc_year_of_registered as integer,
		inc_complexity_code as string,
		inc_om_rule_desc as string,
		inc_ded_used_text_1 as string,
		grp_main_event_code as string,
		inc_year_of_incident as integer,
		grp_main_event_description as string,
		inc_claim_adjuster_code as string,
		top_key as string,
		inc_deleted_ind as string,
		inc_me_claim_cat_type as string,
		inc_claim_process_desc as string,
		inc_incident_risk_group as string,
		inc_retention as decimal(28,10),
		inc_claim_adjuster_job_tlf as string,
		inc_main_claim_detail_code as string,
		top_description as string,
		inc_me_tlo_type as string,
		inc_date_last_reviewed as date,
		inc_incident_reference as string,
		grp_event_detail_description as string,
		inc_description as string,
		inc_gard_claim_id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['pk_key_inc'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		inc_text_restricted,
		inc_ded_used_amount_2,
		grp_claim_incurred_gross_usd,
		inc_longitude,
		inc_key = pk_key_inc,
		inc_imono,
		grp_event_detail_code = grp_event_deatil_code,
		inc_ded_used_curr_2,
		inc_main_jurisdiction,
		best_value_estimate,
		inc_payment_created_by_code,
		inc_date_registered = inc_registered_date,
		inc_registered_by_code,
		inc_me_tlo_ind = DeriveColumns@inc_me_tlo_ind,
		inc_code,
		grp_id,
		inc_gic_incident_id,
		inc_casualty_cause,
		inc_mygard_claim_id,
		inc_main_claim_type_desc,
		inc_ded_used_text_2,
		inc_status_desc,
		grp_key,
		inc_ded_used_amount_usd_1,
		inc_members_reference,
		inc_ind_open,
		inc_voyage_to,
		inc_complexity_desc,
		inc_ded_used_days_1,
		inc_place_of_incident,
		inc_ded_used_amount_usd_2,
		grp_ind_major_incident = grp_ind_major_incient,
		inc_claim_process_code,
		inc_main_claim_handler_code,
		inc_team_description,
		grp_description,
		inc_registered_by_desc,
		reserve_worst_outcome,
		inc_yearmonth_of_registered,
		inc_main_claim_type_code,
		reserve_best_outcome,
		inc_text_unrestricted = inc_text_unresticted,
		inc_date_archive_old,
		inc_claim_adjuster_desc,
		inc_date_archive,
		inc_date_of_incident,
		inc_payment_created_by_desc,
		inc_geotag_reference,
		inc_main_claim_handler_desc,
		inc_ded_used_amount_1,
		inc_ded_used_days_2,
		inc_text,
		inc_om_rule_code,
		inc_main_claim_detail_desc,
		inc_year_of_incident_calyear,
		inc_latitude,
		inc_file_number,
		inc_reserve_created_by_desc,
		inc_vessel_name,
		inc_yearmonth_of_incident,
		inc_ded_used_curr_1,
		inc_reg_in_paris_pool_ind,
		grp_code,
		grp_text,
		inc_immediate_cause,
		inc_incident_risk_group_desc,
		inc_reserve_created_by_code,
		inc_voyage_from,
		inc_year_of_registered,
		inc_complexity_code,
		inc_om_rule_desc,
		inc_ded_used_text_1,
		grp_main_event_code,
		inc_year_of_incident,
		grp_main_event_description,
		inc_claim_adjuster_code,
		top_key,
		inc_deleted_ind,
		inc_me_claim_cat_type,
		inc_claim_process_desc,
		inc_incident_risk_group,
		inc_retention,
		inc_main_claim_detail_code,
		top_description,
		inc_me_tlo_type,
		inc_date_last_reviewed,
		inc_incident_reference,
		grp_event_detail_description,
		inc_description,
		inc_gard_claim_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dimIncident
